          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Statisch Elektrizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'électricité statique</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing how materials rubbed by cloth may charge differently.</string>
          </description>

Materialien, die durch Tuch gelöscht werden, anders als aufladen 
können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrant comment

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran cómo
